Module0.title: Module 0 Visual Simulator

status.idle: Click “New question”. Use overlays to reason visually, then answer.
status.question: Question: {prompt}. Enter a number (tolerance ±{tolerance}{unit}).
status.noQuestion: No active question. Click “New question” first.
status.invalidNumber: Please enter a valid number (e.g., 3.5 or -2).
status.incorrect: ❌ Not quite. You said {value}. Try again using the overlays.
status.noReveal: No question to reveal. Click “New question” first.
status.randomized: Randomized vectors. Drag tips to explore.

desc.2d: Drag vector tips. Projection shows proj₍b₎(a) and optional perpendicular.

3d.beforeZ: Orbit the camera. Drag spheres. Hold
3d.afterZ: while dragging (or enable Depth mode) to change depth.

questions.dot: Compute the dot product a · b
questions.angle: Compute the angle θ between a and b (degrees)
questions.scalarProj: Compute the scalar projection of a on b (shadow length on b)

hud.controls2d: Drag tips. Use projection to see how a decomposes into proj₍b₎(a) + a⊥.

controls3d.beforeZ: Orbit: drag empty space. Pick sphere to drag. Hold
controls3d.afterZ: (or Depth mode) to move along z.

Module0.footerTip: If 3D picking feels hard: zoom in with wheel, then click directly on the sphere tip.
